title: #102: Profiling Mindhunter
description:
The RCP Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) analyze and profile the first 2 episodes of Mindhunter, the groundbreaking new Netflix series produced by Charlize Theron and David Fincher.


New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime
